languages.text: "Пускай Дом Орселлио и познал боль раскола, только мы можем защитить дитя от нас подобных и привести ее путями просветления к трону {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатора{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Пускай Дом Орселлио и познал боль раскола, только мы можем защитить дитя от нас подобных и привести ее путями просветления к трону {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатора{/g}".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and lead her along the paths of enlightenment to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s throne."
languages.original_text: "Пускай Дом Орселлио и познал боль раскола, только мы можем защитить дитя от нас подобных и привести ее путями просветления к трону {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}новатора{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and let her ascend he {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}novator's{/g} throne by paths of enlightenment."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and let her ascend he {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}novator's{/g} throne by paths of enlightenment."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and lead her along the paths of enlightenment to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator's{/g} throne."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and lead her along the paths of enlightenment to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator's{/g} throne."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and lead her along the paths of enlightenment to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s throne."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “尽管奥赛罗家族目前处于令人痛苦的分裂状态，但只有我们能保护这个孩子不受我们的兄弟们的伤害。只有我们能带领她沿着启蒙的道路前进，走向{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}的王座。”
languages.original_text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and lead her along the paths of enlightenment to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s throne."

traits.locale_text: “尽管奥塞罗家族目前处于令人痛苦的分裂状态，但只有我们能保护这个孩子不受我们的兄弟们的伤害。只有我们能带领她沿着启蒙的道路前进，走向{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}大族长{/g}的王座。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Aunque la casa Orsellio haya sufrido un doloroso cisma, solo nosotros podemos proteger a la niña de nuestros hermanos y guiarla por los caminos de la iluminación hasta el trono de la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and lead her along the paths of enlightenment to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s throne."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque la casa Orsellio haya sufrido un doloroso cisma, solo nosotros podemos proteger a la niña de nuestros hermanos y guiarla por los caminos de la iluminación hasta el trono de la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「オーセリオ家は分裂の痛手を負ったかもしれないが、この子を同胞から守り、{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}の王座へと悟りの道を歩ませることができるのは我々だけなのだ」
languages.original_text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and lead her along the paths of enlightenment to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s throne."

traits.locale_text: 「オーセリオ家は分裂の痛手を負ったかもしれないが、この子を同胞から守り、{g|Encyclopedia:Novator}ノベイター{/g}の王座へと悟りの道を歩ませることができるのは我々だけなのだ」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Das Haus Orsellio mag zwar den Schmerz einer Spaltung erfahren haben, aber nur wir können das Kind vor unseren Brüdern schützen und es auf dem Weg der Erleuchtung zum Thron der {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} führen."
languages.original_text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and lead her along the paths of enlightenment to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s throne."

traits.locale_text: "Das Haus Orsellio mag zwar den Schmerz einer Spaltung erfahren haben, aber nur wir können das Kind vor unseren Brüdern schützen und es auf dem Weg der Erleuchtung zum Thron der {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novatorin{/g} führen."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Bien que la maison Orsellio soit actuellement déchirée, nous seuls pouvons protéger l'Enfant de nos frères et la mener sur la voie de l'illumination qui lui permettra de monter sur le trône de la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and lead her along the paths of enlightenment to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s throne."

traits.locale_text: « Bien que la maison Orsellio soit actuellement déchirée, nous seuls pouvons protéger l'enfant de nos frères et la mener sur la voie de l'illumination qui lui permettra de monter sur le trône de la {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Orsellio Hanesi bölünme nedeniyle çeşitli sorunlar yaşıyor olabilir ancak çocuğu kendi taraftarlarımızdan koruyabilecek ve {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} tahtına doğru giden yolunu aydınlatabilecek olan da bizlerizdir."
languages.original_text: "Though House Orsellio may have suffered the pain of a schism, only we can protect the child from our brethren and lead her along the paths of enlightenment to the {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Novator{/g}'s throne."

traits.locale_text: "Orsellio Hanesi bölünme nedeniyle çeşitli sorunlar yaşıyor olabilir ancak çocuğu kendi kardeşlerimizden koruyabilecek ve {g|Encyclopedia:Novator}Rota Reisi{/g} tahtına doğru giden yolu onun için aydınlatabilecek olan bizlerizdir."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
